1172040.name: Investigation Forces: Operation Zero
1172040.description:
Welcome to Warkland, in this game you will follow the character Michael on a long journey of investigations and riddles.
The Warkland Department is an office for paranormal investigations or investigations that the Warkland Police cannot explain.
Throughout history Michael will participate in various events and puzzles that will need to be completed using the Internet.
The player will have the opportunity to give his theory to the game.
The game's historical time is disorganized and confusing to make the main story harder to unravel.


Investigation Forces is a horror and puzzle game based on popular games and legends.
In this game you will investigate legends like Slender, Samara and many others created by Kaustie Productions.


In this game you can play with your friend and the goal is to escape from certain rooms with puzzles.
The game mode will be launched very soon.
This game mode (Operation Zero) is based on The Escape Room movie.


The story of the game is full of puzzles, and terror will have to solve puzzles that could take hours. You will need to use the Internet on some puzzles.


You'll earn medals as new in-game updates come out, those medals will be made available in your inventory and you can share with your friends from your profile.
Customized medals will be made at the request of the community, for example medals related to other games, events, etc.
Investigation Forces has several easter eggs.
1172040.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
